name: ERAYR
description:
ERAYR is a side scrolling fighting puzzle plat-former. 

You are a humanoid robot who is on the run from the police as you've discovered information that you never should of known about the human race. 

You have to save the world by making your way through the city to reach the radio tower to send out the message you have in your database. 

Using your combat skills and humanoid strength you must defeat other humanoid police bots,dodge high powering gun turrets and solve how to get past certain doors while being careful of each step you make .

Team 

Christopher Fagan - Progammer , Level Build , Game Design ,  Audio
